description._content: Meremeeste kokkupuude jaapanlaste ja nende kultuuriga oli väga piiratud. Suhtlus käis vaid kohalike ametnike ning hollandi keelt valdavate tõlkide ehk, nagu neid hollandipäraselt nimetati, „tolk’idega“. - - - The seafarers’ contact with the Japanese and their culture was very restricted. Communication only took place with local officials and translators, who were schooled in Dutch, or, as they were called after the Dutch word, the „tolks“. Viitekood / Reference code: EAA.1414.3.3.209 Lehekülg SAAGAs (vaja registreeruda) / Page in SAAGA (registration needed): www.ra.ee/dgs/_purl.php?shc=EAA.1414.3.3:213
